description:
Charging your phone shouldn’t be so complicated—and it doesn’t have to be if you just get the Anker 511 Nano 3 GaN charger. Now that it’s $13 at Amazon, down from its original price of $23, there’s never been a better time to snag one of these.

We’ve done a deep-dive analysis of the secret to buying the best iPhone 15 USB-C charger, and our own Gordon Ung concluded: “Just buy this Anker 511 GaN charger that’s tiny and can charge your phone at its maximum rate.
title: Our favorite GaN charger for phones is just $13 now (43% off)
